DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate possible changes in quality of life related to health (HRQL) in locally advanced and metastatic prostate cancer patients, after one year of follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life of Patients With Locally Advanced and Metastatic Prostate Cancer
